ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the Ministère de l’Enseignement Supérieur et de la Recherche Scientifique de Côte d’Ivoire for providing a research grant to D. A. Kambiré. We acknowledge J. Assi and H. Téré for their valuable help in the plant identification. The authors are grateful to H. Brevard and N. Barat (Robertet S.A.) for their technical assistance during HREIMS analysis.
